item.description:
Ben S. has once again organized this popular event.

Come one, come all to one of our ever popular Sunday Brunches…Due to the huge number of graduates in the Boston area, I have moved this event to the Cheesecake Factory.

http://www.thecheesecakefactory.com/Locations/locations

We we dine outside on the patio, weather permitting.  Bring some extra light clothes if it is slightly cool. Otherwise we will eat inside.

Choose your entree from a selection of delicious offerings and enjoy the conversations & laughter of your fellow diners. Mark and I have been hosting this brunch for over 9 months and everyone enjoys the group. We now have friends that attend frequently. This is a good opportunity to greet Meetup people. We usually get 44 members and guests.

Attendees are responsible for their own meal; please pay server. Paypal is not accepted at this event. Plenty of parking in the rear.
item.name: Sunday Brunch moved to the Cheesecake Factory Natick Mall
